column4: Hi all.. I just installed 8.10, and I got problems with making my Graphics driver work.. I have a nvidia 7000m, and apparently it's set as "supported" in both nvidia-glx-177 and nvidia-glx-180, but they doesn't work?

well.. they act like nothing happened.. I download and install with synaptic, and when thats done, i restarted, just in case it needed that. And then it just booted up as usually.. i don't see any change at all.. and besides i still only got the 800x600 as the highest resolution.
besides, the last time i tried to get one of the drivers, it said there was a error installing the package..
